Interior Painting

ONIITO delivers smooth matte finishes with razor-sharp lines: careful prep, dust control, low odor, and a spotless handover.

What you get

  • Flawless surfaces — skim coat, sand, prime for true matte.
  • Crisp lines — laser guides & pro cut-ins, no bleed.
  • Clean protection — masked trim, covered floors & furniture.
  • Low-odor paints — premium low-VOC for healthy interiors.

 

Recent work

Smooth matte finish

Skim coat and spot repair, sand to P220, prime, then two uniform coats for a velvety, non-glare look.

Crisp cut-ins

Laser lines, tight masking, and steady cut-ins give razor-sharp edges along ceilings, trim, and outlets.

Accent walls

Uniform coverage and consistent sheen in darker tones without roller marks or flashing.

Process

  1. Prep — protect floors/furniture, patch, skim, sand, dust-vac.
  2. Prime — bonding/spot priming for uniform absorption.
  3. Finish — two coats matte, back-roll for even texture, clean handover.

FAQ

Do you use low-VOC paints?

Yes, premium low-VOC lines with minimal odor and fast curing.

How do you protect furniture and floors?

Plastic wrap, drop cloths, masked edges, and HEPA dust control during sanding.

Will matte show defects?

Matte hides minor texture better than gloss; we still skim and sand for a flawless result.
